title_narrative: Agreement between Itaipu Binacional and FAO
description_narrative: The project intends to support a Project Coordination Unit  for the Southern Region of Brazil (Rio Grande do Sul, Santa Catarina and Paran ) in the context of south-south cooperation, aiming to disseminate results achieved by public policies and programs.
